Post: "Feeling annoyed and overwhelmed, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this miserable emotional state forever and it's going to ruin my relationships, work, and entire life."

Post: "It's getting chilly here, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a rut for the rest of my life - struggling to stay warm, failing to achieve my goals, and feeling isolated from everyone around me."

Post: "Saying goodbye is hard; I guess that means I'm just not cut out for forming meaningful relationships and will always be struggling to connect with others in all areas of my life."
